00061

00110             function                process_category( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'category' ) ; )
00115                         {
00116                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00117                               
00118                               list( $Name , $Default , $Class ) = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 
00119                                     'name,default,class' , 'category,0,width_160 flat'
00120                               );
00121                               $Default = $Default == 0 ? '' : "default=$Default;";
00122                               $NullCategory = $this->get_null_category( $this->BlockSettings );
00123                               $Id = $this->get_category_id( $this->BlockSettings );
00124                               
00125                               $Str = str_replace( 
00126                                     "{category:$Params}" , 
00127                                     "{select:$Default"."class=$Class;name=$Name;query=$NullCategory SELECT id , title as `value`".
00128                                           "FROM umx_category WHERE direct_category![eq]id AND direct_category IN ( $Id )}" , 
00129                                     $Str
00130                               );
00131                               $Changed = true;
00132                         }
00133                         
00134                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00135                   }
00136                   catch( Exception $e )
00137                   {
00138                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00139                   }
00140             }

00172             function                process_category_id( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00173             {
00174                   try
00175                   {
00176                         $Rules = array( 'names' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00177                         
00178                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'category_id' , $Rules ) ; )
00179                         {
00180                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00181                               
00182                               $Names = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'names' , '' );
00183                               
00184                               $Names = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , $Names );
00185                               
00186                               $Ids = implode( ',' , $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_category_ids( $Names ) );
00187                               
00188                               $Str = str_replace( "{category_id:$Params}" , $Ids , $Str );
00189                               $Changed = true;
00190                         }
00191                         
00192                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00193                   }
00194                   catch( Exception $e )
00195                   {
00196                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00197                   }
00198             }

00286             function                process_category_name( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00287             {
00288                   try
00289                   {
00290                         $Rules = array( 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE );

00292                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'category_name' , $Rules ) ; )
00293                         {
00294                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00295 
00296                               $Category = $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_by_id( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' ) );
00297                               
00298                               $Title = get_field( $Category , 'title' );
00299                               
00300                               $Str = str_replace( "{category_name:$Params}" , $Title , $Str );

00353

00388             private function  get_null_category( &$Settings )
00389             {
00390                   try
00391                   {
00392                         $NullCategory = '';
00393                         
00394                         if( $Settings->get_setting( 'null_category' , false ) !== false )
00395                         {
00396                               $Id = $Settings->get_setting( 'null_category' );
00397                               
00398                               $Title = $Settings->get_setting( 'null_category_title' , '' );
00399                               
00400                               $NullCategory = "SELECT $Id AS id , '{lang:$Title}' AS value UNION ";
00401                         }
00402                         
00403                         return( $NullCategory );
00404                   }
00405                   catch( Exception $e )
00406                   {
00407                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00408                   }
00409             }

00485             function                compile_categories_list_type_active_list( &$AllCategories , &$ObjectCategories , 
00486                                                                                                                                           $MasterId , $MasterType )
00487             {
00488                   try
00489                   {
00490                         $ids = get_field_ex( $ObjectCategories , 'id' );
00491                               
00492                         $Code = '';
00493                         foreach( $AllCategories as $i => $Category )
00494                         {
00495                               $id = get_field( $Category , 'id' );
00496                               $Title = get_field( $Category , 'title' );
00497                               
00498                               $Checked = in_array( $id , $ids ) ? 'on' : 'off';
00499                               
00500                               $Code .= "<tr><td>{checkbox:name=_id_$id;current_value=$Checked}".
00501                                            "</td><td align=\"left\">$Title</td></tr>";
00502                         }
00503                         
00504                         return( 
00505                               "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"category_active_list\" value=\"save\"><table>$Code</table>".
00506                               "{direct_controller:package_name=category::category_controller;meta=meta_category_list;".
00507                               "master_id=$MasterId;master_type=$MasterType}"
00508                         );
00509                   }
00510                   catch( Exception $e )
00511                   {
00512                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00513                   }
00514             }

00542             function                compile_categories_list( &$AllCategories , $Type )
00543             {
00544                   try
00545                   {
00546                         list( $MasterId , $MasterType ) = $this->BlockSettings->get_settings( 'master_id,master_type' );
00547 
00548                         if( $this->OwnershipAccess->owner_was_registered( $MasterId , $MasterType ) === false )
00549                         {
00550                               $Type = 'list';
00551                         }
00552                         
00553                         $ObjectCategories = $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_object_categories( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00554                         
00555                         switch( $Type )
00556                         {
00557                               case( 'list' ):return( $this->compile_categories_list_type_list( $ObjectCategories ) );break;
00558                               case( 'active_list' ):
00559                                     return( 
00560                                           $this->compile_categories_list_type_active_list( 
00561                                                 $AllCategories , $ObjectCategories , $MasterId , $MasterType
00562                                           )
00563                                     );
00564                               break;
00565                               default:return( '{lang:illegal_list_type}' );break;
00566                         }
00567                   }
00568                   catch( Exception $e )
00569                   {
00570                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00571                   }
00572             }

00604             function                process_category_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00605             {
00606                   try
00607                   {
00608                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'category_list' ) ; )
00609                         {
00610                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00611                               $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'list' );
00612                               $CategoryName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'category_name' );
00613                               if( $Type == 'checkbox_list' )
00614                               {
00615                                     $ids = implode( ' , ' , $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_category_ids( $CategoryName ) );
00616                                     $Code = "{checkboxset:cols=1;query=SELECT id , title FROM umx_category WHERE ".
00617                                                 "direct_category IN ( $ids ) AND id <> direct_category;checked_all=1}";
00618                               }
00619                               else
00620                               {
00621                                     $AllCategories = $this->CategoryAccess->get_children_by_name( $CategoryName );                                    
00622                                     $Code = $this->compile_categories_list( $AllCategories , $Type );
00623                               }
00624                               $Str = str_replace( "{category_list:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00625                               $Changed = true;
00626                         }
00627                         
00628                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00629                   }
00630                   catch( Exception $e )
00631                   {
00632                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00633                   }
00634             }

00658             function                get_select_category_from_tree_data( &$BlockSettings )
00659             {
00660                   try
00661                   {
00662                         $CategoryName = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'category_name' );
00663                         $Name = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'category' );
00664                         $Title = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , 'category_selection' );
00665                         $Class = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'width_160 flat' );
00666                         $CategoryId = $this->CategoryAccess->get_category_id( $CategoryName );
00667                         $id = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , "select_category_from_tree_$CategoryId" );
00668                         $Value = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , $CategoryId );
00669                         $VisibleValue = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 
00670                               'visible_value' , 
00671                               "{record_field:access_package_name=category::category_algorithms;field=title;id=$Value}"
00672                         );
00673                         
00674                         return(
00675                               array(
00676                                     'category_name' => $CategoryName , 'name' => $Name , 'title' => $Title , 
00677                                     'class' => $Class , 'value' => $Value , 'visible_value' => $VisibleValue , 'id' => $id
00678                               )
00679                         );
00680                   }
00681                   catch( Exception $e )
00682                   {
00683                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00684                   }
00685             }

00717             function                process_select_category_from_tree( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00718             {
00719                   try
00720                   {
00721                         $Rules = array( 'visible_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00722                         
00723                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select_category_from_tree' , $Rules ) ; )
00724                         {

00726                               
00727                               $Data = $this->get_select_category_from_tree_data( $this->BlockSettings );
00728 
00729                               $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'select_category_from_tree.tpl' );
00730                               
00731                               $Code = $this->String->print_record( $Code , $Data );
00732 
00733                               $Str = str_replace( "{select_category_from_tree:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00734                               $Changed = true;
00735                         }
00736                         
00737                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );

00775             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00776             {
00777                   try
00778                   {
00779                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00780                         
00781                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category_id( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00782                         
00783                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category_siblings_ids( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00784                         
00785                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00786                         
00787                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category_name( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00788                         
00789                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_category_tree( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00790                         
00791                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_select_category_from_tree( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00792 
00793                         return( $Str );
00794                   }
00795                   catch( Exception $e )
00796                   {
00797                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00798                   }
00799             }
